meeting_request.purpose: Help with adjusting to college and feeling overwhelmed in my math-heavy major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Antonio, a sophomore in the mathematics major. I’ve been doing well academically, with a 3.7 GPA so far. But I’m in a really heavy math-heavy track, and there’re a lot of coursework I’m taking that I don’t really understand or relate to. I’m also in a major that requires a lot of writing and critical thinking, and I find those assignments really difficult. I’m feeling overwhelmed and not sure if I’m doing well enough in my major or if I’m even on track. I’m reaching out because I’m starting to feel like I’m not living up to the expectations of the major I’ve chosen, even though I’m doing well academically.
